effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that summons a Storm Elemental for 6.0 sec. Casting Ascendance always hits a Jackpot!
Set: When you summon or extend your Storm Elemental, your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Tempest, and Lava Burst deal 30% increased damage for 8 sec.

sockets.display_string: +159 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: While above 80% health, direct healing you do also redistributes up to 2% of your health to your target.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Summon a Bursting Lightspawn which sacrifices its health to unleash Bursts of Light, inflicting 710,431 Holy damage split between nearby enemies every 2 sec while it lives. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,494, further increased by 918 while you remain within its light.
